p: S. sclarea EO chemical composition is reported in Table 3. Fifteen and thirteen compounds were identified in the liquid and vapor phase, respectively. Oxygenated monoterpenes were the most abundant compounds (76.6% and 62.9%), among which linalyl acetate reached the higher percentages in both phases (62.6% and 30.1%) followed by linalool (11.1%, 28.9%). β-Copaene (6.7%) and β-cubebene (5.0%) were the main sesquiterpene hydrocarbons detected in the liquid and vapor phase EO, respectively.
